ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ ras 'bul 'bul ba'i bud med de khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dad pa sdud

par byed pa la ras phul nas shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te ngas de la chos bstan nas/ bden pa mthong bar gyur te rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/

sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun rnams la bkur sti bya'i bkur sti med par mi bya'o zhes dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par

bstod do// //ne tso zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams

dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /

lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong

rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po gzugs can snying po rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /

rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang

dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la/ bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/ /rgyal po de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs te/ snying rje che ba/ bdag nyid

che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ skye dgu la byams pa zhig go/ /de nas re zhig na bcom ldan 'das mthong bar smon te/ lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/ /de nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du thugs ngan mdzad/ rgyal pos

smras pa/ ngas bcom ldan 'das ring zhig ma mthong ngo / /ngas bde bar gshegs pa ring zhig ma mthong ngo / /da ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'dod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyin par gnas pa la zhugs pas/ lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas rgyal po

gzugs can snying po smon pa gsan to/ /de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa'am mi gzigs pa'am mi rtogs pa'am thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la

phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul

ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ /chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i

seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ yan lag lnga rnams par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi

me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas pa/ /stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad

par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni rgud/ su ni dar/ su ni phongs shing 'dug /su ni nyam nga bar gyur/ su ni gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang

gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol/ su ni ngan song du 'bab/ su ni ngan song du bab/ su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/ mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i

nor bdun med pa las/ 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par

grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ /'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ /gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po gzugs can

snying po la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ dbyar zla ba gsum 'das nas chos gos mdzad de chos gos zin nas chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas ljongs rgyu zhing mthar gyis gshegs pa las nags khrod cig tu byon pa dang / nags khrod de na ne tso mi skad shes pa zhig

gnas te/ des bcom ldan 'das thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo / /de nas shin tu rings par song ste/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so legs so/ /bdag la phan gdags su

gsol/ nags khrod 'di kho nar gshegs dgongs gdab par gsol zhes byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ne tso de la phan gdags pa'i phyir shing gang la ne tso gnas pa de'i drung du rtswa'i gdan bting nas skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/ /nyan thos chen po rnams

ni shing gzhan dag gi drung du 'khod do/ /de nas ne tsos bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos rnams la mi'am/ mi ma yin pa'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po'am/ sam gcan gzan gnod pa byed du dogs te/ mtshan thog thag nags khrod de na phan tshun skor

bar byed do/ /de nas nam langs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bzod pa gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa lags pas/ bdag la bcom ldan 'das mchod pa'i rgyu ci yang ma mchis na bzod pa

mdzad du gsol/ /de lta lags kyis kyang bdag sngon du mchis te/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po la bcom ldan 'das gshegs so zhes sbran par 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar gyis shig /de nas re zhig na de bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon du

chas te mthar gyis rgyal po'i thad du phyin to/ /de'i tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po ni khang steng na bud med 'ba' zhig dang sil snyan gyis rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de nas ne tso mi skad shes pa des rgyal po la smras pa/ kye rgyal po khyod mkhyen par mdzod

cig /bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyod kyi yul du gshegs lags kyis/ lha khyod kyis bshos sta gon mdzad pa'i rigs so zhes byas so/ /de nas rgyal po shin tu rings par khang steng nas babs te/ blon po chen po'i

tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan rnams bshams nas gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das bsu'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan

thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ bkur sti chen po dang ldan pas nang du spyan drangs nas zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas so/ /de nas ne tso de 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi 'byor pa 'di dag thams cad ni bdag gi yon tan yin no snyam du

rig nas dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas rgyal po'i mdun logs su phan tshun du lding ba las khras khyer te bsad do/ /bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed de shi bas ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /

lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang

bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo / /de nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni/ bdag gi cha ma yin gyis bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das

la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang spr-i ka la sogs pas

byugs pa des/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man da ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor

te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos

nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas/ dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang

mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal

pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i

ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyis mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug

bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do shal 'phyang

ba dga' gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song / /de nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa'

bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag ni srod dang tho ras mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de

dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i

dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir

'ongs pa ma yin no/ /ne tso gang gis nga nags khrod der nub mo'i dgongs mal la spyan drangs pa de khyod kyis mthong ngam/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ne tso de nyid

shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa de yin no/ /dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag bgyis na/ des ne tsor skyes lags/ las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes te bden pa

mthong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus las

byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi

'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /

'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar

gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas re zhig na de na dge

bsnyen cig 'dug pa des bslab pa lhod par byas te las de'i rnam par smin pas ni ne tsor skyes so/ /nga la sems dga' bar byas pa des ni lhar skyes so/ /des bslab pa'i gzhi lhag ma rnams bsrungs pa des ni bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las

gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar

'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de

skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //pho nya zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang / pho

brang 'khor kyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis

bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams

chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas par dbyar gnas par

dam bcas so/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po la rgyal bar gyur cig /sku tshe ring bar shog shig ces bstod nas gsol ba btab pa/ lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag

gis bcom ldan 'das yun ring mo zhig tu ma mthong ste/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal bas skom lags so/ /bdag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal lo zhes byas so/ /de nas rgyal pos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la smras

pa/ khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das de da ltar gang du dbyar gnas par bzhed pa khyod kyis ci thos/ mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ lha bdag gis bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu dbyar gnas par dam bzhes so zhes thos lags so/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po

gsal rgyal dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la sogs pa pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang yul mi dang blon po rnams kyis mi zhig pho nyar bkug ste/ kye mi khyod tshur shog /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song la/ der phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos

phyag 'tshol la/ bdag cag gi mchid nas/ bcom ldan 'das gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang ldan nam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsol la/

'di skad du btsun pa ko sa la'i rgyal po dang mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar 'tshal te/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das yun ring mo zhig tu ma mthong bas/ bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal

bas skom lags so/ /bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal na thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod par gshegs su gsol zhes mchi'o zhes gsol cig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas mi des ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / blon

po dang / pho brang 'khor kyi mi dang / yul mi rnams kyis bsgo ba bzhin du mnyan te/ rgyal po'i khab tu song nas/ mthar gyis song song ba las rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du phyin to/ /de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer thams cad du bltas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la

ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i pho brang 'khor kyi mi

rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang ldan nam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas

sam zhes mchi'o/ /'di skad du bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das ring mo zhig tu ma mthong ste/ bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal bas skom lags so/ /bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal na/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom

ldan 'das mnyan du yod par gshegs su gsol zhes kyang mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye gal te nga rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'gror ster na 'gro bar bya'o/ /de nas pho nya des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gsol nas/ bcom ldan

'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gshegs par rgyal po gzugs can snying pos dad pa stsal lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la

cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das dbyar zla gsum 'das nas/ chos gos mdzad de chos gos zin nas chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas zhabs 'bring 'khor mang po dag dang mnyan du yod pa logs su chas te gshegs so/ /

pho nya yang shing rta la zhon te chas so/ /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhabs kyis gshegs pa mthong nas shing rta las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /thugs brtse ba'i slad

du bdag gi shing rta bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i shing rta dang / /yang dag stsol la nga gnas nas/ /nyon mongs tsher mas ma snad par/ /sa steng kun tu rgyu bar byed/ /pho nyas gsol

pa/ /bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul gyi zhabs kyis gshegs pa lags kyis kyang / bdag la phan gdags pa dang thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcibs su gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das pho nya la phan gdags pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis shing rta'i steng du bzhugs so/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta la bcibs bzhin du mnyan du yod par byon nas pho nyas kyang rgyal po la sbran to/ /de nas rgyal po dang / blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / yul mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das bsu nas/ chos nyan pa'i phyir de'i mtshan

mo rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal de nyid du 'khod do/ /pho nya de ni tshe thung ste chos thos pa'i 'og tu de nyid kyi mtshan mo shi ste/ de shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa

gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo / /

de nas sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas sngon pho nyar gyur

pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang spr-i ka la sogs pas byugs pa/ des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i

me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dang pad ma dkar po dang / man dA ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan

'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas

sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang /

mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal

pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i

ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ /bdag ni

sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas

do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song / /de nas sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa

'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal khang

steng na 'dug pas snang ba chen po de mthong nas nam langs pa dang bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta

ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyis/ khyod kyi pho nya de nga la sems dga' bar

gyur nas shi ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan te bden pa mthong bar gyur te rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de nas rgyal po de ngo mtshar du gyur nas kye ma sangs rgyas kye ma chos kye ma dge 'dun

'di dag la ni chung ngu zhig byas kyang rnam par smin pa chen por 'gyur ro zhes smras so/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/

stan las langs te song ngo / /der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di gsum ni mchog tu gdags pa yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa dang / chos mchog tu gdags pa dang / dge

'dun mchog tu gdags pa'o/ /sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/ sems can rkang med rnams sam/ rkang gnyis rnams sam/ rkang bzhi rnams sam/ rkang rnams sam/ gzugs can rnams sam/ gzugs can ma yin pa rnams sam/ 'du

shes can rnams sam/ 'du shes can ma yin pa rnams sam/ 'du shes yod pa yang ma yin 'du shes med pa yang ma yin pa gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog yin par bstan to/ /sangs

rgyas la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag ni rnam par smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/ mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar

shes par bya ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o/ /chos mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/ 'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos mchog yin par ston to/ /chos la

mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi rnam par smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya

ste/ 'di ni chos mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o/ /dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na tshogs sam/ 'dus pa'am/ mang po'am/ 'khor gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mchog yin par bstan te/

dge 'dun la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi ni rnam par smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/ mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba'

zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/ 'di ni dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang

po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po bcu bzhi pa/ ma he zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon

rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/

lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha

dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las nags khrod cig tu byon pa dang / nags khrod de na ma he'i khyu chen po dang ma he rdzi lnga brgya 'khod do/ /de nas re

zhig na de'i nang na ma he stobs dang ldan zhing stobs kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ de mi gzhan dag gi dri tshor na phyi bzhin rgyug par byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs so/ /de nas ma he rdzi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang

bcas pa thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo / /de nas de dag gis skad cher bos te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di na ma he ma rungs pa mchis kyis/ shul 'dir mi gshegs su gsol zhes byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /kye ngas 'dir dus la bab par shes

kyis khyed snying ma chung shig /de nas ma he des bcom ldan 'das thag ring mo zhig nas mthong ba dang rnga ma ldang du gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der brgyugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun logs su seng ge ral pa can ral pa g.yengs pa lnga sprul te/

glo g.yas g.yon du mi chen po lnga sprul to/ /steng du ni lcags kyi pha bong chen po zhig sprul to/ /de nas ma he des phyogs kun tu 'jigs pa chen po mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung du song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lces bldags nas zhum pa'i

bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das la bltas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la/ des brda phrad pa'i skad du bzhin 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o/ /mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes chos tshig gsum

bstan nas/ tshe rabs kyang dran par mdzad de de thos nas ngus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni dud 'gror skyes pa la/ /da ni nga yis ci byar yod/ /mi khom par ni skyes zin gyis/ /don med ngus pas ci la phan/ /

'dir ni rgyal ba snying rje can/ /nga la dad pa'i sems bskyed la/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas spangs na legs/ /'on kyang mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de nas ma he ma rungs pa des rang gi lus la dmad de kha 'tshos nas/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags

rnams ni me'i drod che bas de skyen par shi ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam

mo/ /de nas dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo / /de nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan

'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos

brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / spr-ika la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pal dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man

dA ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ nags khrod de dag thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i

bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom

nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho

ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis

sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan

'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /

skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig

rten kha bltas lha yul song / /de nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa

de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de nas ma he rdzi de dag gis snang ba chen po de mthong ngo / /de mthong nas the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das mdang sum bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchis

te/ lha'i 'od kyis snang bar bgyis pa de su zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyi ma he de nga la sems dga' bar gyur te shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes te/ de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs nas ngas de la chos bstan te/

bden pa mthong bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de nas ma he rdzi de dag mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te ngo mtshar to/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa 'di yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das dang phrad nas lha'i nang du skyes te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur na bdag

cag gis ci ste khyad par thob par mi 'gyur snyam mo/ /de nas de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung ste/ de dag gis brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas

nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag bgyis na des ma

her skyes lags las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes te bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ ma he rdzi 'di rnams kyis ni las ci bgyis na des ma he rdzir gyur lags/ las gang bgyis pas ni rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ongs pa'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ de dag nyid kyis las byas shing

bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par

mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la

bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde

bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs

so/ /de'i tshe dge slong dag gtan la 'bebs par byed pa na/ dge slong sde snod gsum pa zhig 'khor lnga brgya dang gtan la 'bebs pa'i nang na 'dug go/ /de'i nang na slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong dag kyang yod de/ de dag sde snod gsum pa la 'dri bar byed la/ des

ni lan ma thebs pa dang / de khros nas ngag gi las rtsub po phyung ste/ nags kyi ma he dang 'dra ba 'di dag ci shes zhes byas so/ /de'i slob ma rnams kyis kyang ma he rdzi dang 'dra ba 'di dag ci shes zhes smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong

dag ji snyam du sems/ dge slong sde snod gsum pa gang yin pa de nyid ma he 'di yin no/ /slob ma de dag ni ma he rdzi 'di dag yin te/ las des na tshe rabs lnga brgyar ma her skyes so/ /slob ma rnams kyang ma he rdzi lnga brgyar gyur to/ /nga la sems dga' bar gyur pa des

ni lhar skyes so/ /dge slong gi dngos po thob ste tshul khrims bsrungs pas ni bden pa mthong ba dang dgra bcom nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de bas na ngag gi nyes pa spang ba'i phyir 'bad par bya ste/ ci nas ma he dang ma he rdzi rnams kyi nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar

mi 'gyur ba dang / lha'i bu de'i yon tan gyi tshogs de lta bu thob par 'gyur bar dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon

par bstod do// //bsnyen gnas zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams

dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin

dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun

gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang na lha'i bu bsnyen gnas zhes bya ba

zhig yod de/ de chos mnyan pa'i phyir rtag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro'o/ /de nas phyis re zhig na lha'i bu bsnyen gnas g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/

chos mnyan pa'i phyir phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu bsnyen gnas kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos

nas lha'i bu bsnyen gnas kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i

rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma

bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /

shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/ /

'phags pa dgyes pa zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs

gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song / /de nas lha'i bu bsnyen gnas tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad

las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de'i tshe dge slong dag srod dang tho ras mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong

ngo / /mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad

du mchis lags sam/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ /lha'i bu bsnyen gnas g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa nga

la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs te ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de nas dge slong de dag the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa lha'i bu bsnyen gnas ga las byung lags/ ming

ni ci las btags lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed nyan par 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas

bshad do/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/

skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /phyis re zhig na rgyal po kr-i kI bcom ldan

'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song ngo / /de nas re zhig na bram ze gnyis drang srong smra bar don zhig la song ba dang / de gnyis kyis rgyal po de rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang rgyal po'i mthu stobs dang ldan pa mthong ngo / /de nas de gnyis rgyal srid la 'dod pa skyes nas/

de gnyis kyis dge bsnyen zhig la dris pa/ kye sangs rgyas kyi dge bsnyen las ci zhig byas na/ des ci bsams pa dang ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhes byas so/ /dge bsnyen gyis smras pa/ gang gis bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa yongs su dag par

bsrungs pa de'i ni ci bsams pa dang ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes byas so/ /de nas bram ze de gnyis kyis khyim bdag chu stod las bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa blangs te bsrungs so/ /de na gcig gis ni yongs su dag par bsrungs te/ de

nas shi nas rgyal po kr-i kI'i bur skyes te de'i bu'i ming legs skyes zhes btags nas pha shi ba'i 'og tu de rgyal por bcug go/ /cig shos kyis ni bsnyen gnas nyams par byas te de ni shi nas klu'i nang du skyes te/ de'i steng du nyin gcig bzhin du lan bdun bdun bye tshan bab ste

des rus pa 'ba' zhig lus par byed do/ /de nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di las gang gi 'bras bu yin/ 'di las gang gi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yin na/ des bdag gis 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing 'dug snyam mo/ /de nas des bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang

ldan pa/ bdag gis blangs pa las bslab pa lhod par byas pa des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal bdag gis nyams su myong la/ gang gis blangs te bsrungs pa des ni rgyal srid thob par gyur to snyam mo/ /yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ da yang bdag gis bsnyen gnas yan

lag brgyad dang ldan pa bsrung bar bya'o/ /'on kyang bdag klu'i skye gnas las thar bar 'gyur yang srid do snyam mo/ /de nas bram ze'i cha lugs su bdag nyid sprul nas/ rgyal po'i thad du 'ongs te phyin nas/ rgyal po la rgyal bar gyur cig /sku tshe ring bar shog cig

ces bstod nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bdag la 'tshal gyis lha bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa stsal du gsol/ gal te ma stsal na gdon mi 'tshal bar lha'i dbu tshal pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro zhes byas nas de

nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po 'jigs shing skrag ste/ mi dga' la skyi bung zhes byas nas gser 'bum yod pa'i snod rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ bdag gi yul thams cad du dril bsgrags nas/ su nga la bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan

pa ston pa de la gser 'bum 'di sbyin no/ /bkur sti chen pos kyang bkur bar bya'o zhes bsgo'o/ /de nas re zhig na shing mkhan gyi bu mo bud med rgan mo zhig 'dug pa des/ rgyal po la ka ba zhig bstan te/ sngon bdag gi pha rtag tu ka ba 'di la spos dang / bdug pa dang /

me tog gis mchod pa bgyid na/ 'od phyung ste gzigs shig ces byas so/ /de nas rgyal pos zham ring ba rnams la ka ba 'di phyung shig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring rnams kyis ka ba de phyung ba dang / de'i 'og nas bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan

pa dang / dge bsnyen gyi bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun gser gyi glegs bam la bris pa zhig rnyed do/ /de nas rgyal pos klu de la bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa zhig bris te byin to/ /drang srong smra ba na gnas

pa'i drang srong khri nyis stong gis kyang byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon sum du byas so/ /klu des kyang bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bsrungs nas thang la phyung ste lus bor nas de kha 'tshos te 'dug go/ /de nas de shi ste g.yog 'khor lnga brgya

dang bcas te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /dge slong dag bsnyen gnas ni de las byung ste ming yang de las btags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la

mngon par bstod do// //ngang pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang /

klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma

yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams

brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas

pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad rnams med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang

dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/ /phyis re zhig na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / pany+tsa la'i

rgyal pos/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la ngang pa lnga brgya skyes su bskur te/ gang gi tshe rgyal po rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba de'i tshe ngang pa lnga brgya po de dag phul lo/ /de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis ngang pa de dag la mi 'jigs pa byin te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal de nyid du

btang nas/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyan thos chen po'i 'khor dang bcas pa bshos gsol zhing bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ ngang pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro la/ bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos chen po de dag gis kyang de rnams la khyos ma byin te/ de dag gis

zos nas tshim zhing mgu la dbang po brtas te 'khod do/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po de dag la chos ston pa de'i tshe/ ngang pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste chos nyan par byed do/ /de nas de dag tshe thung ste/

shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ /lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos/ gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ /de nas ngang pa las shi 'phos

pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa de dag gis mthong ngo / /de nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i

phyir 'gro ba ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin

po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur gum dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / spr-i ka la sogs pas byugs pa de dag gis de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pal dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man dA ra rnams kyis

thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi

bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes

rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ de dag gis bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song

gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang / bdag cag lha dang mi'i nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag cag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi

tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ /yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ /shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ /bsod nams rab ldan

mtho ris 'gro ba phye/ /mya ngan 'das lam bdag cag rnams kyis thob/ /bdag cag de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig /shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ /bdag cag sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /mi

mchog dbang po lha dang mis mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ /srid pa stong du mthong bar dga' ba yi/ /thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/ /de nas do shal 'phyang rnams dga' gyur te/ /btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dgra

thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song / /de nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa

gang gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du lhags pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de'i tshe dge slong srod dang tho ras mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo / /mthong

bas kyang the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta

ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin no/ /dge slong dag ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal

rgyal gyis/ ngang pa lnga brgya 'dir btang ba khyod kyis mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ de dag nga la sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes te/ de dag mdang sum nga'i thad du lhags nas de dag la

ngas chos bstan te bden pa mthong bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo / /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis las gang dag

bgyis na des ngang par skyes lags/ las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes te bden pa mthong lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba'

rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa

rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched

rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang

po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams

kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe 'di dag rab tu byung ba las bslab pa la lhod par byas pa des ni ngang par skyes so/ /nga la

sems dga' bar byas pa des ni lhar skyes so/ /bslab pa lhag ma rnams bsrungs pa des ni bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las

gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs

la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par

bstod do/ /gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa drug pa rdzogs so// //sdom ni/ gser 'od dang ni dri zhim dang / /byad bzang stobs ldan sdu gu dang / /pad ma mig dang rnga sgra dang / /bu dang nyi ma gyad pa

dang / /gser 'od ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams

dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang /

nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams

brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang

ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu

lon pa dang bu byung ste khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mi'i kha dog las ni 'das lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdog 'dra ba zhig btsas te/ de'i gser gyi 'od kyis grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas

so/ /de nas pha ma dang sems can gzhan dag gis de mthong nas ltad mo la lhags te sems can gyi khyad par 'di lta bu ni ga las 'ongs zhig gu zhes mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas sems pa la zhugs so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u

'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re 'di btsas pa na grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad gser gyi 'od kyis snang bar byas pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming gser 'od ces gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u gser

'od pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi nying khu dang / gzhan

yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de yang mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa dang / dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/

snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa zhig go/ /phyis re zhig na/ de byad gzugs kyis rgyags pas myos te grong khyer gyi phyi rol na rtse zhing 'dug go/ /shAkya mang po dag cig kyang shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar dong ngo / /de nas khye'u gser 'od kyis mthong nas

dris pa khyod gar 'dong / de dag gis smras pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar 'gro'o/ /de nas khye'u gser 'od kyis sangs rgyas zhes bya ba thos te/ sngon ma thos pa'i ming thos nas spu thams cad zing zhes byas

te/ mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro gor ma chag snyam nas de yang shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / khye'u gser 'od kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/

mthong ma thag tu byad gzugs kyis rgyags pa med par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan nas/ des chos de thos pa dang

rab tu 'byung bar 'dod par gyur to/ /de nas re zhig na pha ma la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan

'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gser gyi kha dog can glang po che'i sna ltar 'dug pa brkyang nas/ khye'u gser 'od la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gzhon nu tshur shog tshangs par spyod cig /de skad ces bka' stsal ba'i mod la skra dang kha spu bregs

nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur/ spyod lam ni bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa lta bur 'dug par gyur/ lag na ni lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs par gyur to/ /'dir smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur zhes bka' stsal pas/ /de ni mgo bregs lus

la snam sbyar gyon/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni dgongs pas gos bgos nas/ /mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yid la byed pa'i lung phog ste/ des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad

pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs

nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar

gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang

gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa gser 'od kyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di ltar gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang rab tu

byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gser 'od nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de

dag byas shing bsags pas na/ gser 'od nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i

khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can

dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba

'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/ sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med

pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad

gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ mchod rten gyi dus ston yang lugs btod do/ /de nas re zhig na khyim bdag cig mchod rten gyi dus ston byed pa der song ba las mchod rten de las gser gyi me long

zhig lhung ba des mthong nas/ des de'i rna ba'i gong rgyan du bcos nas/ mchod rten de la btags te/ spos dang / bdug pa dang / me tog gis mchod nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par

gyur cig /ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni khye'u

gser 'od 'di yin te/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa des na 'di lta bur byad gzugs kyi khyad par can du gyur to/ /smon lam btab pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /

dge slong dag de ltar na/ las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las

'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod

kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //dri zhim zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po

rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams

dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis

mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yul ser skya'i gnas

na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des

rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug

la mdzes pa zhig mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig btsas te/ de'i kha nas me tog ud pa la'i dri 'byung la/ lus thams cad las ni tsan dan gyi dri 'byung ngo / /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags

zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ de'i nye du rnams na re 'di'i kha nas ud pa la'i dri byung la/ lus thams cad nas tsan dan gyi dri byung bas na de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming dri zhim zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u dri zhim pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma

snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi nying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang

ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de yang sngon gyi rgyu'i stobs kyi shugs kyis dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang la bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can/ bdag nyid che la/ chos

'dod pa zhig ste/ gang gi tshe khye'u dri zhim zhing dpung rgyan dang mgul pa'i do shal dang gdu bus brgyan te srang gi nang du zhugs pa de'i tshe/ tsan dan gyi dri bsung gis grong khyer thams cad khyab par gyur te/ skye bo mang pos kyang lha'i spos kyi dri tshor nas mchog tu ya

mtshan du 'dzin te/ 'di skad du/ kye ma bsod nams dag gi mthu zhes zer ro/ /phyis re zhig na khye'u dri zhim n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar song ngo / /de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan

pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba

bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang

bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u dri zhim gyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du

byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad

snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas

gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i

rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

la zhus pa/ btsun pa dri zhim gyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di'i kha nas ni ud pa la'i dri 'byung la/ lus thams cad nas ni tsan dan gyi dri 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dri zhim nyid

kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ dri zhim nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong

bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa

rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /

dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/

bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las re zhig na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs

rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/

rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ mchod rten gyi dus ston yang lugs btod do/ /khyim bdag gcig gis kyang de la dad pa bskyed nas/

spos dang byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs phul te/ bdug pa dang me tog gis mchod nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig /

ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni khye'u dri zhim 'di yin

te/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa des na 'di lta bur dri zhim por gyur to/ /smon lam btab pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag

de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par

smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/ bam po lnga pa/ byad bzang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma

yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'

lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong

rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na/ shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam

thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa de/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags

nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa/ lus byad dpe med la mdog 'jam pa/ lus kyi bdun mtho ba/ che bar grags

pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re 'di'i lus dpe med pas na de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming byad bzang zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas

khye'u byad bzang pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang /

mar gyi nying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge ba bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can

bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa zhig ste/ 'jig rten thams cad dang tha na mi ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /des sa phyogs gang du gom pa bor ba de dag kyang gtsang mar gyur te/ de ltar bsod nams

dang ldan zhing che bar grags so/ /phyis re zhig na de shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od

'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la

phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan

te/ de thos nas khye'u byad bzang gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung

ngo / /des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos

can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i

sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba dbang po dang nye dbang

dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong rnams the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa byad bzang gis las gang

dag bgyis na/ des 'di'i lus 'di lta bur gyur la dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag byad bzang nyid kyis/ sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba'

rgal bzhin du byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na byad bzang nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi

rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye

mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal

pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi

rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las

thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la/ sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/

rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der rgyal po gnyen yod gnyen gyi tshogs dang bcas pa dang / blon po'i tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring

byas pas mchod rten gyi dus ston byas so/ /phyis re zhig na nyi ma gcig cig /mi dbul po zhig mchod rten gyi 'khor sa'i nang du song nas des de la me tog rnyis pa dag dang / mchod rten rdul gyis yog pa dag mthong ngo / /de nas des sangs

rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas dad pa skyes te/ phyags ma blangs nas mchod rten yang phyags me tog rnyis pa yang bsal to/ /de nas mchod rten la rdul med cing dri ma med pa mthong nas/ dga' ba skyes te zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/

smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa 'dis na bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig /ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na mi dbul por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ byad bzang 'di yin te/ des mchod rten la phyag dar byas pas na byad gzugs bzang por gyur to/ /smon lam btab pa

des ni tshe 'di nyid la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa

yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par

dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //stobs

ldan zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu
